shortcv.p: Dr GEORGE PAPAMICHAEL is a Lecturer in the Technology and Management Department of the Athens University of Economics and Business. He received his Ph.D from the Department of Informatics at the same University and his B.Sc in Computer Engineering and Informatics from the University of Patras. He is a senior researcher of the Eltrun (The E-Business Center) at the Athens University of Economics and Business. His research interests include Small Group Decision Support Systems, Intelligent and Advanced Computational methods for Decision Making and Emerging Paradigms in Electronic Commerce. He has published articles in several Journals and International Conference Proceedings.
For more information please visit his personal web page
